Summary: phasing orange ball with solid black triangle inside
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Battle Ground
There was one other sighting in Battle Ground on or around August 9th 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was watching the lightning storms east of my house, i looked up and saw a orange ball phasing bright to dim. when it was dim i could see and outline of a dagger or arrow head that was black. i double check were jupiter was, and iss was, but this was below the cloud cover. it was also sitting still then making a oval pattern in the same spot in the sky for about a min. then it reappeared did the same thing over a period of 15 minutes... i was facing the se facing larch mt from battle ground ( over skamania co) my line of sight was about 35\45 degrees above the horizon. mean while my cat was howling and screaming and very guarded. he has never acted this way before.
